text: Dame Pieter Ane Stewart is a New Zealand businesswoman. In the 1980s, she established her own promotions company and modelling agency, and was the associate editor of New Zealand Fashion Quarterly from 1985 to 1987. She founded New Zealand Fashion Week in 2000. In the 2012 Queen's Birthday and Diamond Jubilee Honours, she was appointed a Dame Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit, for services to fashion and the community. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:20th-century New Zealand businesspeople Category:New Zealand businesswomen Category:New Zealand editors Category:Dames Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit Category:21st-century New Zealand businesspeople Category:20th-century businesswomen Category:21st-century businesswomen
title: Pieter Stewart
